articles.content:

articles.title: Review | '1776' is back on Broadway with vivacity and a revolutionary cast - The Washington Post
articles.description: The two directors have filled this 1969 musical with transgender and nonbinary actors.
articles.content: NEW YORK The remarkable revival of 1776, cast entirely with female, transgender and nonbinary actors, is not as much about the pronouns as it is about a verb. Because the delightful ensemble owns the… [+5600 chars]
